text: Valangin was a municipality in Val-de-Ruz in the canton of Neuchâtel in Switzerland. The Valanginian Age of the Cretaceous Period of geological time is named for Valangin. On 1 January 2021, the former municipalities of Corcelles-Cormondrèche, Peseux and Valangin merged to form the municipality of Neuchâtel. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Neuchâtel Category:Val-de-Ruz District Category:Cities in Switzerland Category:Neuchâtel
title: Valangin
